name: Nodemw
body:
nodemw
======

MediaWiki API client written in node.js

## Requirements

* nodejs

## How to install

`git clone https://github.com/macbre/nodemw.git`

## Examples

Example scripts can be found in examples directory:

`
cd nodemw/examples
node getPagesInCategory.js
`

# API
